message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your business. We're offering this remarkable opportunity to you today at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, and we're confident it will provide significant benefits to your organization.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $950,000 is above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $750,000 for it. This is my best offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the value we both place on this deal.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, I am pleased to extend a counteroffer of $850,000 for the product. This is a special consideration given the importance of this transaction to both of us. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise while still providing substantial value to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $850,000 is still slightly above what I can afford. I'm prepared to pay $800,000, my absolute maximum.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product and the fact that we are both eager to close this deal. Let's make this happen!
